info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 12:43PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Washington County through 130 PM MDT... At 1243 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Apple Valley, or 11 miles west of Colorado City, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Apple Valley, Hildale and Rockville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
